mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_group_message(group_id, sender_id, content, type, create_time) VALUES(#{groupId}, #{senderId}, #{content}, #{type}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM chat_group_message m LEFT JOIN chat_group_message_read r ON m.id = r.message_id AND r.user_id = #{userId} WHERE m.group_id = #{groupId} AND (r.read_state IS NULL OR r.read_state = 0) ORDER BY m.create_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_group_message_read(message_id, user_id, read_state) VALUES(#{messageId}, #{userId}, 0)
